reviews.review_msg: He just rambles on about unrelated**** in class. Exams are a mix of self evidently true, and impossible to know questions.

The course was not hard but if you want to take this course don't take it with him.  He can teach ling well but never cogs 100.  He kept reading off textbook(not the one you have) in lecture and is hard to follow.  Exams are brutal.
too many EXAMPLES and  UH-OH-OH !! interesting course with a bad match of professor.
You'll grow to love him.  Vastly experienced and very helpful.  Marks great too.
